title: Trafalgar Tours Highlights of Vietnam
inclusions_evidence: Flights from Hanoi to Danang and Hue to Ho Chi Minh City
An expert Travel Director and professional Driver
Cherry-picked hotels, all tried and trusted
Breakfast daily and up to half of your evening meals

flights.assumed_route: International flights to Vietnam and domestic flights within Vietnam

other.notes: Additional costs for meals and optional tours not included in the package.

reasoning: The deal includes comprehensive inclusions such as flights, meals, and guided tours, which would be significantly more expensive if booked separately. The estimated savings are substantial, making it a highly attractive option.
additional_notes: Consideration of optional experiences and local activities adds value to the package.
